integration.description: Microsoft Graph lets your app get authorized access to a user's Outlook mail data in a personal or organization account.
integration.name: O365 Outlook Mail (Using Graph API)

playbook.description:
This playbook retrieves the original email using the Microsoft Graph Mail integration.
Note: You must have the necessary permissions in the Microsoft Graph Mail integration as described in the [message-get API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/message-get) and the [user-list-messages API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-messages)
playbook.name: Get Original Email - Microsoft Graph Mail

widget.name: API Call Results for Microsoft Graph Mail

description: Microsoft Graph lets your app get authorized access to a user's Outlook mail data in a personal or organization account.
name: Microsoft Graph Mail
readme:
O365 Outlook Mail (Using Graph API) gives you authorized access to a user's Outlook mail data enabling you to perform cybersecurity investigations, leading to rapid incident responses and threat protections against ransomware and spearfishing.

## What does this pack do?
Using the commands in this integration, you can:

- Access the properties of emails.
- Delete an email or an email folder.
- Access the attachments of an email.
- Access mail folder lists.
- Create a new mail folders.
- Update the properties a folder.
- Retrieve an email message
- Create draft messages.
